title._content: Mediators at Niagara Falls -- Ambassador Naon & son Romulo, Justice Lamar, Amb. De [i.e., da] Gama, Lehmann, Minister Suarez & son  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Mediators at Niagara Falls -- Ambassador Naon & son Romulo, Justice Lamar, Amb. De [i.e., da] Gama, Lehmann, Minister Suarez & son 1914 May 22 (date created or published later by Bain) 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title and date from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photograph shows Argentine ambassador to the U.S. Rómulo Sebastián Naon Peralta Martínez (1876-1941), Brazilian ambassador to the U.S. Domício da Gama (1862-1925), Chilean ambassador to the U.S. Eduardo Suarez Mujica (1859-1922), U.S. Supreme Court Justice Joseph Rucker Lamar (1857-1916), and U.S. Solicitor General Frederick William Lehmann (1853-1931), during the 1914 Niagara Peace Conference. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2011 and New York Times, May 1914) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Niagara Falls Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.15980 Call Number: LC-B2- 3050-7
